executive_summary.summary: Comprehensive AI discovery analysis for Metro Health Systems identifying 7 transformative use cases across patient care, operational efficiency, and clinical outcomes. Total potential annual savings of $12.8M with an average ROI of 98%.

use_cases.title: AI-Assisted Clinical Documentation
use_cases.description: Natural language processing system that automates clinical note generation from physician-patient conversations, reducing administrative burden and improving documentation accuracy.
key_benefits: 2 hours per physician per day saved on documentation
Enhanced physician satisfaction and reduced burnout

use_cases.title: Patient Flow Optimization
use_cases.description: AI-powered system that predicts patient volume and optimizes staff scheduling, room allocation, and resource utilization to reduce wait times.

use_cases.title: Predictive Patient Deterioration Alerts
use_cases.description: ML model that analyzes vital signs, lab results, and clinical data to predict patient deterioration 12-24 hours before critical events.
key_benefits: Improved patient outcomes and mortality rates

use_cases.title: Revenue Cycle Automation
use_cases.description: AI system that automates claims processing, identifies billing errors, and optimizes reimbursement through intelligent coding suggestions.

use_cases.title: Virtual Health Assistant
use_cases.description: AI-powered chatbot that handles appointment scheduling, medication reminders, and routine health questions, improving patient engagement.

use_cases.title: Medical Imaging Analysis
use_cases.description: Computer vision system that assists radiologists in detecting abnormalities in X-rays, CT scans, and MRIs, improving diagnostic accuracy and speed.
key_benefits: Improved early detection of critical conditions

use_cases.title: Supply Chain Demand Forecasting
use_cases.description: Predictive analytics for medical supplies and pharmaceuticals that optimizes inventory levels and reduces waste while ensuring availability.
